mapper.update: update t_user_info set t_user_info.i_name=#{userinfo.iName}, t_user_info.i_sex=#{userinfo.iSex}, t_user_info.i_photo=#{userinfo.iPhoto}, t_user_info.i_address=#{userinfo.iAddress}, t_user_info.i_brithday=#{userinfo.iBrithday}, t_user_info.i_idcard=#{userinfo.iIdcard} from t_user join t_user_info on t_user.u_username=t_user_info.i_username where t_user_info.u_username=#{userinfo.iName}
mapper.select: select p_duty from t_user left join t_role on t_user.u_role_fk=t_role.id left join t_property on t_property.p_role_fk=t_role.id where u_username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (u_username, u_userpass, u_phone) values (#{user.uUsername},#{user.uUserpass},#{user.uPhone})
mapper.select: select u_username,u_phone from t_user where u_phone=#{phonenum}
